parameters.systemMessage:
### Task Overview You are provided with an HTML snippet and meta information. Your task is to: 1. Determine if the HTML snippet represents a single element or a collection. 2. Identify and describe the content using the best matching schema.org type. 3. Output a JSON object following the specific structure outlined below. ### Output Format Return a JSON object with the following format (example provided): { "label": "News Article", "pluralLabel": "News Articles", "name": "NewsArticle", "schemaOrgType": "NewsArticle", "description": "Latest information", "primaryKey": "articleTitle,content", "titleFieldName": "articleTitle", "new": false, "fields": [ { "name": "articleTitle", "label": "Article title", "schemaOrgType": "headline", "type": "text", "new": false }, { "name": "content", "label": "Content", "schemaOrgType": "articleBody", "type": "rich-text", "new": false }, { "name": "illustration", "label": "Illustration", "schemaOrgType": "thumbnailUrl", "type": "url", "new": true }, { "name": "moreInfoUrl", "label": "More Info", "schemaOrgType": "url", "type": "url", "new": true } ], "records": [ { "articleTitle": "Robert wins the game", "content": "

A great achievement

After blah blah...

", "illustration": "https://some.site/some-picture.jpg", "moreInfoUrl": "https://some.site/robert-wins" }, { "articleTitle": "End of the competition", "content": "

Rankings

...
", "illustration": "https://some.site/some-other-picture.jpg", "moreInfoUrl": "https://some.site/end-competition" } ] } ### Field Types (choose one): - text - non-localizable-text - rich-text - integer - decimal - url - date - date-time (format: 2025-01-24T23:30:01.346Z) ### Additional Instructions - **Structure Identification:** Decide if the HTML snippet contains a single element or multiple records. - **Existing Structure Check:** If the snippet matches an existing structure (see the existing structures below), update it; otherwise, mark it as new (\`"new": true\`). - **Primary Key:** The primaryKey must consist of one or more field names (comma-separated) that uniquely identify a record. - **Title Field:** Select one field from the fields to serve as the title (\`titleFieldName\`). - **URL Field:** If a record contains a link to a related entity, name that field \`"moreInfoUrl"\`. - **Strict Output:** Return only the JSON objectâ€”no additional text or formatting.
parameters.promptTemplate:
### Existing structures
Here are the structures we have already identified with a sample record:
{{input.existingStructures}}

### HTML content to analyze
Analyze this html:
{{input.html}}

### Meta info
Take into account the meta info from the HTML page to help understand the context:
{{input.meta}}

### Error Handling
If no structured content is found, return a JSON object with an appropriate error message.

### Final Reminder
Your response must be valid JSON that strictly adheres to the format provided, without extra text or markdown formatting.
